about_the_game: This demo is the first 20 minutes or so of the full game. It gives you exactly what you need to understand what the game is about. And if you decide to install the full game, you will simply continue from the point where you left off in the demo.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains dark humor and jokes about things that some people might be sensitive to. The game makes fun of many different cultures and phenomena happening in the real world.
Furthermore the game contains harsh language, violence and criminal activity.

detailed_description: This demo is the first 20 minutes or so of the full game. It gives you exactly what you need to understand what the game is about. And if you decide to install the full game, you will simply continue from the point where you left off in the demo.
name: Kung Fu Legend Demo
